p: J.J.Z., G.L.C. and L.Q.C. devised the original concept, designed the experiments and discussed the interpretation of results. J.J.Z. and L.P.Y. co-wrote the paper. Q.S.K., Z.H.L. and X.H.Z. fabricated the separator. C.J.Z., Q.X., B.Z. and G.L.D. optimized the polymer separator. B.S.Q., Y.L.D., Q.F.W. and J.H.Y. performed the electrochemical experiments. All authors discussed the results and participated in manuscript revision.
